item.title: 3 simple navbar Template
item.description:
In accordance with what I said some time ago on social media, this time I will provide 3 simple and responsive navigation bar templates to complement the website or blog that you are creating.

There are 2 ways to use this template, you can download all the files (html, css, js) in my github repository or directly copy the code from this article.

the method

  • download
  • copy

navigation view

1 first

2 second

3 third

download all files

Open this link https://github.com/dai-re/3-navbar-templates

Click code after that click download ZIP

Or you can also use the terminal by

1

git clone https://github.com/dai-re/3-navbar-templates

copy the code

first style

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=Edge">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css">
  <title>nav style 1</title>
</head>

<body>

  <!-- NAV STYLE1 -->
  <div class="nav_body">
    <div class="nav_box">
      <div class="logo">MYLO<span style="color: #fff">GO</span></div>
      <div class="hamburger" id="hamburger">
        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-menu-2" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="2" stroke="currentColor" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
          <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none" />
          <line x1="4" y1="6" x2="20" y2="6" />
          <line x1="4" y1="12" x2="20" y2="12" />
          <line x1="4" y1="18" x2="20" y2="18" />
        </svg>
      </div>
      <div class="menu" id="menu">
        <ul>
          <li><a href="">menu1</a></li>
          <li><a href="">menu2</a></li>
          <li><a href="">menu3</a></li>
          <li><a href="">menu4</a></li>
          <li><a href="">Main Btn</a></li>
        </ul>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
  <!-- NAV STYLE1 -->


  <script src="main.js"></script>
</body>

</html>

* {
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
}

:root {
  --logo: #C51212;
  --bg: rgba(48, 49, 59, 1);
}

.nav_body {
  width: 100%;
  background: var(--bg);
  padding: 8px 0px;
  position: relative;

}

.nav_box {
  margin: auto;
  color: #fff;
  width: 85%;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
}

.nav_box .logo {
  font-weight: 900;
  font-size: 20px;
  letter-spacing: 4px;
  color: var(--logo);
}

.menu {
  margin-top: -25em;
  position: absolute;
  right: 2px;
  transition-duration: 1s;
  z-index: 3;
  opacity: 0;

}

.menu ul {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  width: 150px;
  padding: 8px;
  align-items: center;
  background: var(--bg);
  border-radius: 5px;
  gap: 10px;
}

.menu-active {
  margin-top: 13em;
  opacity: 1;

}

.menu ul li {
  list-style: none;
}

.menu ul li:active {
  color: var(--logo);
}

.menu ul li:nth-child(5) {
  color: #fff;
  font-weight: 500;
  background: var(--logo);
  padding: 5px 8px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.menu ul li:nth-child(5):hover {
  background: #7A1717;
}

.menu ul li a {
  color: unset;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.hamburger {
  position: absolute;
  right: 10px;
  z-index: 5;

}

@media only screen and (min-width: 480px) {
  .nav_body {
    width: 100%;
    background: var(--bg);
    padding: 10px;
  }

  .nav_box {
    margin: auto;
    color: #fff;
    width: 85%;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .nav_box .logo {
    font-weight: 900;
    font-size: 20px;
    letter-spacing: 4px;
    color: var(--logo);
  }

  .menu {
    margin-top: 0;
    position: relative;
    right: 2px;
    z-index: 6;
    opacity: 1;

  }

  .menu ul {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: row;
    right: 2px;
    width: auto;
    padding: 0;
    align-items: center;
    background: unset;
    border-radius: 0;
    gap: 10px;
  }

  .menu ul li {
    list-style: none;
  }

  .menu ul li:active {
    color: var(--logo);
  }

  .menu ul li:nth-child(5) {
    color: #fff;
    font-weight: 500;
    background: var(--logo);
    padding: 5px 8px;
    border-radius: 5px;
  }

  .menu ul li:nth-child(5):hover {
    background: #7A1717;
  }

  .menu ul li a {
    color: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .hamburger {
    display: none;
  }
}

javascript

1
2
3
4
5
6

let hamburger = document.getElementById('hamburger')
let menus = document.getElementById('menu')

hamburger.onclick = function(){
  menus.classList.toggle('menu-active')
}

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css">
  <title>nav style 2</title>
</head>

<body>
  <div class="nav_body">
    <div class="nav_box">
      <div class="logo">
        <span>
          LOGO
        </span>
      </div>
      <div class="search">
        <input class="in" type="text" name="" id="" placeholder="Search">
        <div class="btn_input">
          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-search" width="15" height="15" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="2" stroke="#fff" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
            <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none" />
            <circle cx="10" cy="10" r="7" />
            <line x1="21" y1="21" x2="15" y2="15" />
          </svg>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</body>

</html>

*{
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
}
body{
  background: #fff;
}
.nav_body{
  background: #fff;
  box-shadow: 0px 2px 3px  rgba(149, 149, 149, 0.5);
  padding: 8px 0px;
}
.nav_box{
  display: flex;
  padding: 0px 10px;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
}
.logo span{
  font-weight: 800;
}
.search{
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}
.search .in{
  border: none;
  background: rgba(192, 192, 192, 0.4);
  padding: 5px;
  border-radius: 5px;
  margin-right: 5px;
  font-weight: bold;
}
.btn_input{
  background: #4BC85E;
  width: 20px;
  padding: 3px;
  text-align: center;
  border-radius: 5px;
}
.btn_input svg{
  margin-bottom: -2px;
}

<body>

  <!-- NAV STYLE1 -->
  <div class="nav_body">
    <div class="nav_box">
      <div class="logo">MYLO<span style="color: #fff">GO</span></div>
      <div class="hamburger" id="hamburger">
        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-tabler icon-tabler-menu-2" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="2" stroke="currentColor" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
          <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none" />
          <line x1="4" y1="6" x2="20" y2="6" />
          <line x1="4" y1="12" x2="20" y2="12" />
          <line x1="4" y1="18" x2="20" y2="18" />
        </svg>
      </div>
      <div class="menu" id="menu">
        <ul>
          <li><a href="">menu1</a></li>
          <li><a href="">menu2</a></li>
          <li><a href="">menu3</a></li>
          <li><a href="">menu4</a></li>
          <li><a href="">Main Btn</a></li>
        </ul>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
  <!-- NAV STYLE1 -->


  <script src="main.js"></script>
</body>

</html>

* {
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
}

:root {
  --logo: #C51212;
  --bg: rgba(48, 49, 59, 1);
}

.nav_body {
  width: 100%;
  background: var(--bg);
  padding: 8px 0px;
  position: relative;

}

.nav_box {
  margin: auto;
  color: #fff;
  width: 85%;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
}

.nav_box .logo {
  font-weight: 900;
  font-size: 20px;
  letter-spacing: 4px;
  color: var(--logo);
}

.menu {
  margin-top: -25em;
  position: absolute;
  right: 2px;
  transition-duration: 1s;
  z-index: 3;
  opacity: 0;

}

.menu ul {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  width: 150px;
  padding: 8px;
  align-items: center;
  background: var(--bg);
  border-radius: 5px;
  gap: 10px;
}

.menu-active {
  margin-top: 13em;
  opacity: 1;

}

.menu ul li {
  list-style: none;
}

.menu ul li:active {
  color: var(--logo);
}

.menu ul li:nth-child(5) {
  color: #fff;
  font-weight: 500;
  background: var(--logo);
  padding: 5px 8px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.menu ul li:nth-child(5):hover {
  background: #7A1717;

.menu ul li a {

@media only screen and (min-width: 480px) {
  .nav_body {
    width: 100%;
    background: var(--bg);
    padding: 10px;
  }

  .nav_box {
    margin: auto;
    color: #fff;
    width: 85%;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .nav_box .logo {
    font-weight: 900;
    font-size: 20px;
    letter-spacing: 4px;
    color: var(--logo);
  }

  .menu {
    margin-top: 0;
    position: relative;
    right: 2px;
    z-index: 6;
    opacity: 1;

  }

  .menu ul {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: row;
    right: 2px;
    width: auto;
    padding: 0;
    align-items: center;
    background: unset;
    border-radius: 0;
    gap: 10px;
  }

  .menu ul li {
    list-style: none;
  }

  .menu ul li:active {
    color: var(--logo);
  }

  .menu ul li:nth-child(5) {
    color: #fff;
    font-weight: 500;
    background: var(--logo);
    padding: 5px 8px;
    border-radius: 5px;
  }

  .menu ul li:nth-child(5):hover {
    background: #7A1717;
  }

  .menu ul li a {
    color: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .hamburger {
    display: none;
  }
}

donation

item.title: About
item.description:
Hello, Dear friends, Welcome to Dai re also, we are happy you want to know something more about our site

So, basically, nowadays people are more dependent on online products and services that’s why we also, take forward a step to help you.

Our first wish is to provide you with a better solution to solve your problem. So, kindly if you don’t get any solution then mention it in the comment section.

Also, we are trying to provide fresh & latest content that provides you ideas about all updated information that’s happening in the world.

In the below section you can get more ideas about our site like our website category and content category.

If you have additional questions or require more information about our About Us Page, do not hesitate to contact us through email at dairewahandi@gmail.com

What is Our Goal?

There are millions of websites created every day, also, there is much fake content spread on the internet.

So, Our main goal is to provide you with 100% Original and Safe content that provides you a great and better experience on the world wide web.

We mainly focus on our service so and improving it regularly to provide a better user experience to all users.

Basically, we focus on the Tesh,tutorial,news niche so, our main priority is to search for new content and present it in front of you to learn something new.

What is our Service?

We are mainly focused on the Tech,tutorial,news category so, we provide Tesh,tutorial,news related content if you are interested in the Tesh,tutorial,news category then you can visit daily to get more latest information.

I’m a junior front - end developer based in Indonesia. I’m passionate about cutting - edge , pixel perfect , beautiful interfaces and intuitively implemented UX

On our website Dai re you get can all Tesh,tutorial,news related information also, we focus on many other categories and we hope you like also, the content of other categories that are maintained on our website. So, you can visit our website homepage to know all category details here you can visit our homepage Click here –>Dai re.

Also, we provide a Notification update service you can join by email and other Social Media Platforms, and all Links you can get on the Homepage visit now. Dai re

About Dai re

As you can see already we mention what is our goal and Service again we repeat that we mainly focus on Tesh,tutorial,news Category to help people.

This Website is Created By Dai re to help people because many people are still spending hours of time to get exact information so, this is the only motive to create Dai re to help people and provide them a better web experience. Also, This About Us Page is Generated With Soumya help.

Now, the time is to know about the Admin Details of this website, so, now we have to go down to know about Admin details.

Admin’s Statement for Dai re As per my point of view, there are many people who visit the internet to get some information but 90% of the time they get wrong information so, the first priority of our website Dai re is to provide 100% legit and accurate information to our users, Also, I hope my dream comes true one day, and our website will provide Original Content to provide a better user experience. So, From my Side thanks for visiting our website.

Admin’s Contact Information Hi, this Dai, in the above paragraph you know about the website properly and now I am going to provide my contact details.

If you have any problem & suggestions for this website then you can contact me by using following contact details.

Name Dai Email: dairewahandi@gmail.com Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/deiterada Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/03ii00/ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dei.terada
